classData.comment:
/**
         * Used for wheel events. min value = 1.
         * A higher value means lesser sensitivity for wheel events
         * => you need to scroll "more" to trigger a month / year change
         * @member {Number} mouseWheelDelta=1
         */
classData.description: Used for wheel events. min value = 1. A higher value means lesser sensitivity for wheel events => you need to scroll "more" to trigger a month / year change
